00028 /// \brief
00029 /// Enumeration for datatypes used by stream readers.
00030 enum FdoStreamReaderType {
00031         FdoStreamReaderType_Byte,
00032         FdoStreamReaderType_Char,
00033         FdoStreamReaderType_WChar
00034 };
00035 
00036 
00037 /// \brief
00038 /// The FdoIStreamReader class is a top level interface for stream reader classes. 
00039 /// The API it provides allows the user to read large streams of data in blocks of items. 
00040 class FdoIStreamReader : public FdoIDisposable
00041 {
00042 public:
00043     /// \return
00044     /// /// Returns the Stream reader type
00045    /// 
00046    FDO_API_COMMON virtual FdoStreamReaderType GetType() = 0;
00047 };
